content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Data Protection Controls\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No Access by Default\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By default, EPAM prefers not to have access to production data (including personal information / PII) and EPAM personnel should seek alternatives to accessing, handling or processing such production data (including personal information / PII).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"According to the company policy, EPAM should avoid wherever possible  accessing, using, storing, handling or processing live/production data for test purposes and only fictitious test data is acceptable.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Customer production data (either complete sets or masked parts) are not and shall not be used for testing on EPAM's premises or in the public cloud.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If any data that seems to be personal information or PII is received from the Customer, the Project Manager or Account Manager must seek written confirmation from the Customer that the data is fictitious test data and not personal information / production / PII data. Until such written confirmation is received from the Customer, such data shall be handled as if it were personal information (or PII) and (except if EPAM would be in breach of contract) their usage for testing purposes shall be suspended.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Only Upon Authorized Request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a Customer asks for support/maintenance related works on their production data, (including any personal information or  PII data), then the authorized EPAM employee(s) shall act by strictly following the security measures specified in the Contract, Master Service Agreement or Statement of Work, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Authorization and other preparation (e.g., negotiating working environment, completing requirements, and arranging trainings) shall be managed by the Project / Account Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Medical or other sensitive data associated with an individual and protected by local Data Protection laws are to be handled by EPAM Systems only upon authorized request from the data owner (specific person).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compliancy with Standards\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM developed strong security controls to protect data based on the each have a distinct user ID for identification, authentication and authorization purposes. To the extent that it is possible, EPAM will seek the individual's consent to the collection, use, dissemination, and maintenance of their personal data.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"False Interpretation of Data Privacy – Restricted protocols\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Torrent and Peer-to-peer communication, originally designed to hide the identity of the involved partners, are forbidden at EPAM by the NDAs we sign with our Clients. We have a collective responsibility to ensure that we handle this responsibly and not only per the mandate of our clients. EPAM must prevent violations of laws and regulations and thus does not allow EPAM resources to be affected. Monitoring tools are applied to detect Torrent and P2P communication attempts; employees who disregard this policy will be subject to formal disciplinary proceedings.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that EPAM policy restricts the use of anonymizers and software that circumvents any network monitoring/tracking system.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Where to Store Customer Information\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Using web-based services (e.g. Dropbox, etc.,) for storage of and collaboration on company-related content is strictly forbidden. If you upload confidential/personal info to a public service on the Internet, you cannot control it anymore, as they might be collected or shared with others. Use internal EPAM resources instead to store company- or Customer-related content.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As
